name: DTVForum.info / AVForum.com.au V4 Theme Tidyup
description:
Removes much of the excess whitespace in DTVForum.info's new V4 theme, as well as tweaking a few other things (user icon shape/size, text size, background matching, etc).

Tested on FF 38.8.0 ESR & Google Chrome 52.0.x.
